dialog.text: Hi, how are you doing? The seeker  is doing well. The supporter could say how the seeker is doing and suggest some problems the seeker could overcome.
Oh, hi. I'm doing good. How about you?
Yeah, I'm doing ok. The seeker  is feeling scared about her job situation. The supporter could provide helpful tips on how to change the situation.
Is there anything I could help you with? Any troubles?

Yeah, it's something about my best friend. We used to hang out together quite often, but he's got a new girlfriend recently. His girlfriend is very unpleasant to everyone and doesn't allow him to spend a lot of time with us. That's bothering me. The seeker  is feeling felt anxious about best friend because it is something important to the seeker. The supporter could offer the seeker support resources like telling a story or writing down what is bothers the seeker.
I can see why this is bothering you. It is very unfair that your best friend is not being fair to you and his girlfriend. I think you deserve better than that.
beam_texts: I can see why this is bothering you. It is very unfair that your best friend is not being fair to you and his girlfriend. I think you deserve better than that.

dialog.text: I agree, but I don't know how to get over it. It's been like this for as long as I can remember. How do I get over the fact that my best friend doesn't like me? The seeker  feels like she is trapped in a nightmare and cannot break out. The supporter could say the seeker could ask her best friend to not be so avoidant and to not be so distant.
I think you need to be firm with your friend and tell him how you feel. If he is your best friend, he will listen and do something about it.
beam_texts: I think you need to be firm with your friend and tell him how you feel. If he is your best friend, he will listen and do something about it.

dialog.text: I have tried to talk to him. He just dismisses it. I don't know how to get him to listen. The seeker  is feeling overwhelmed about her best friend not being a fairy go-between. The supporter could help the seeker to find support groups or recommend books or articles to help get over the feeling.
I think you need to be firm with him and tell him how you feel. If he is your best friend, he will listen and do something about it.
beam_texts: I think you need to be firm with him and tell him how you feel. If he is your best friend, he will listen and do something about it.

dialog.text: I think you're right. I'm just worried that it will damage our relationship. The seeker  is feeling worried about the best friend because the seeker does not have any memories or experiences with him. The supporter could help the seeker to find support groups or talk to his friends.
I think if you are honest and say that you love him and want the best for him, then that can't hurt your relationship.
beam_texts: I think if you are honest and say that you love him and want the best for him, then that can't hurt your relationship.

dialog.text: I think you're right. I just don't want our relationship to end. The seeker  is worried that she will not be able to keep her job after her friends tells her that she doesn't like her. The supporter could tell her to try to set up a tight time schedule or join a study group to get more motivations.
I think it's important that you be honest with him and let him know how you feel. I think he will understand and you can work it out.
beam_texts: I think it's important that you be honest with him and let him know how you feel. I think he will understand and you can work it out.

dialog.text: I will do that. I hope it works out. The seeker  is feeling better after beingbrought out of her deep thoughts. The supporter could tell her that she needs to be honest with her friend and let him know how she feels.
I think it will too. You seem like a very honest person and I think he will appreciate that.
beam_texts: I think it will too. You seem like a very honest person and I think he will appreciate that.

dialog.text: Thank you. You have been helpful. The seeker  is happinessed because the supporter has been helpful.
I wish you the best of luck. I hope you feel better.
beam_texts: I wish you the best of luck. I hope you feel better.

dialog.text: Thank you. I hope we can continue to help others. The seeker  is looking for support because of the worrying about her best friend not being fair. The supporter could help the seeker to understand that the best thing to do is be honest with her friend and tell him how she feels.
I think you will do just fine.
